## S3 Bucket Used in Project

Bucket Name:
myglue-etl-project

Region:
ap-south-1 (Mumbai)

Purpose:
This bucket is used as the data lake for the event-driven ETL pipeline.

Structure:
- input/        : Raw incoming data
- output/       : Processed data generated by AWS Glue
- scripts/      : Glue ETL scripts
- athena-results/: Query results from Amazon Athena
- temp/         : Temporary files used during processing

Data Ingestion Pattern:
Data is uploaded to the input/product/year=2022/ prefix.
This structure enables partitioned processing and efficient querying.
